name: Heist (itch) (Jamie Cropley)
description:
This game is an entry to the AI and Games Jam 2021, it is somewhat unfinished but the first level is about 80% playable and all the AI aspects of it are 100% complete without issues.

Please note that cover image of this game page is provided to me under license, however under such license it is not used for the game only for promotional purposes.
